Verses: 1 dhevan Namakku Adaikkalamum Belanum, Aabaththukkaalaththil Anugoolamaana Thunaiyumaanavar.
2 aagaiyaal Boomi Nilaimaarinaalum, Malaigal Natuchsamuththiraththil Saaindhuponaalum,
3 adhin Jalangal Kondhaliththup Pongi, Adhin Perukkinaal Parvadhangal Adhirndhaalum, Naam Payappadom. (selaa.)
4 oru Nadhiyundu, Adhin Neerkkaalgal Dhevanudaiya Nagaraththaiyum, Unnadhamaanavar Vaasampannum Parisuththa Sthalaththaiyum Sandhoshippikkum.
5 dhevan Adhin Naduvil Irukkiraar, Adhu Asaiyaadhu; Adhikaalaiyile Dhevan Adharkuch Sagaayampannuvaar.
6 jaadhigal Kondhaliththadhu, Raajyangal Thaththaliththadhu; Avar Thamadhu Saththaththai Muzhangappanninaar, Boomi Urugippoyitru.
7 senaigalin Karththar Nammodirukkiraar; Yaakkobin Dhevan Namakku Uyarndha Adaikkalamaanavar. (selaa.)
8 boomiyile Paazhkkadippugalai Nadappikkira Karththarudaiya Seygaigalai Vandhu Paarungal.
9 avar Boomiyin Kadaimunaimattum Yuththangalai Oyappannugiraar; Villai Odiththu, Eettiyai Murikkiraar; Radhangalai Neruppinaal Sutterikkiraar.
10 neengal Amarndhirundhu, Naane Dhevanendru Arindhukollungal; Jaadhigalukkulle Uyarndhiruppen, Boomiyile Uyarndhiruppen.
11 senaigalin Karththar Nammodirukkiraar; Yaakkobin Dhevan Namakku Uyarndha Adaikkalamaanavar. (selaa.)
